faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services and policies.
faq.noResultsText: Try a different search term or check out the categories below.
faq.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or check out the categories below.
faq.contactText: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please contact our customer support team.

questions.orderTracking: How can I track my order?
questions.productQuality: What is the quality of your pet products?
questions.passwordReset: How can I reset my password?
questions.petFoodIngredients: What are the ingredients in your pet food?
questions.damagedProducts: What should I do if I receive a damaged product?

answers.orderTracking: To track your order, log into your account and go to the 'Orders' section. Here you can find tracking information for your recent purchases. Alternatively, you can use the tracking number provided in the shipping confirmation email.
answers.deliveryTime: Delivery time varies depending on your location. Standard local delivery usually takes 3-5 business days. Express delivery takes 1-2 business days. International shipping can take 7-14 business days depending on the destination country and customs procedures.
answers.productQuality: We pride ourselves on offering only high-quality pet products. All our products undergo strict quality control and are sourced from reliable manufacturers. We choose durable, pet-safe materials and regularly test our products to ensure they meet quality, safety and durability standards.
answers.returnPolicy: Unused products in original packaging can be returned within 30 days of receipt. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund or exchange. Please note that shipping costs for returned products are not refunded unless the product is defective or sent incorrectly.
answers.passwordReset: To reset your password, click the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page. Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.
answers.orderCancellation: Yes, you can cancel your order if it hasn't been shipped yet. To do this, log into your account, find the relevant order in the 'Orders' section and click the 'Cancel Order' button. If the order has already been shipped, you'll need to wait for it to arrive and then start the return process.
answers.internationalShipping: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. International shipping rates are calculated based on destination, weight and package dimensions. Please note that additional duties, taxes or fees may apply according to your country's customs requirements and these are the customer's responsibility.
answers.petFoodIngredients: Our pet foods are made with high-quality, natural ingredients and contain no artificial preservatives, colors or flavors. We use high-quality proteins, whole grains and fresh vegetables. Detailed ingredient information is provided on each product page. If your pet has allergies or special dietary needs, please check the ingredients carefully or contact us.
answers.damagedProducts: If your product arrives damaged, take photos of the damage and contact our customer service within 48 hours of receiving the package. We will send you a replacement as soon as possible or provide a refund. Keep the original packaging until the problem is resolved.
